results.title: Show me English: a visit to the doctor [episode 5]
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Trevor Lunn, David Ferris and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. On the second visit to the doctor, Tina is given the result of her test and is prescribed medication and given advice on the importance of diet and rest. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Show me English: the job interview [episode 7]
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Trevor Lunn, David Ferris and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. Shows Tina how to apply for a job and the background information that is required from the applicant.Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Mirror, mirror: girls, self esteem & physical activity
results.creator_credit: John Gall, Gabrielle Kelly and Adelaide College of TAFE

results.title: Return to Botany Bay
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
results.brief_description: Intersperses 1987 documentary footage of the re-enactment of the voyage of the First Fleet with Trevor Lunn interviewing an Australia Post representative discussing their role in the Bi-centennial re-enactment and production of the commemorative stamp series.

results.title: Visions of perfection
results.creator_credit: Diane Charleson, TV Ed Productions and Prahran School Support Centre
results.brief_description: The Victoria College of the Arts provides a venue for talented children in the performing arts of music and dance to combine these with their academic studies in a high school setting. A student violinist, percussionist, ballet dancer and pianist talk about the courses available and demonstrate some of the activities in the school.

results.title: Show me English: a visit to hospital [episode 4]
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Trevor Lunn, David Ferris and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants to communicate in everyday situations. The receptionist at a large hospital gives directions to Tina on how to find the Pathology Department. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Open doors ... opportunities in trade training for women
results.brief_description: Interviews with women apprentices show the opportunities in various trades; they are training to be nursery attendants, motor mechanics, plumbers, refrigeration mechanics, and optical glass makers. They speak about career prospects, work satisfaction and attitudes towards female apprentices. No other credits available.
results.title_for_label: Open doors … opportunities in trade training for women
results.description: Interviews with women apprentices show the opportunities in various trades; they are training to be nursery attendants, motor mechanics, plumbers, refrigeration mechanics, and optical glass makers.
